rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that respects Vastu principles for positive energy flow and is aligned with the main gateway of the irregular plot.
A spacious Mediterranean living area with ample natural light, open plan layout and integrated design elements that promote a sense of calm and relaxation.
A functional kitchen designed with modern amenities and Mediterranean aesthetics. The kitchen is placed in the eastern side to align with Vastu recommendations for prosperity.
A multi-functional studio space that serves as a living/dining and bedroom area. Incorporates flexible furniture and storage solutions to optimize the irregular plot dimensions.
A two-car garage integrated into the design on the western side of the ground floor for ease of access and alignment with building norms.

openings.description: A primary entry point that adheres to Vastu guidelines, ensuring a balanced flow of positive energy into the building.
Large windows that maximize natural light and maintain an open connection with the exterior environment.
A dedicated entrance for vehicle access, designed in line with local building codes.

rooms.description: A private master bedroom designed with Mediterranean accents and positioned according to Vastu for tranquility and comfort.
An ensuite bathroom adjoining the master bedroom, incorporating modern fixtures and a spa-like ambiance.
A spacious rooftop terrace offering panoramic views of the surroundings, designed with Mediterranean landscaping and Vastu elements to enhance relaxation.

openings.description: A balcony providing fresh air and natural light, aligned with local design practices.
A dedicated entrance from the living area on the ground floor to the rooftop terrace, ensuring smooth circulation and adherence to building norms.
